metadata.source: Rob Adriaensen, Hans T. Bakker and Harunaga Isaacson, Groningen : Egbert Forsten 1998- (Groningen Oriental Studies)

children.text: jñānaṃ ca yaḥ prahiṇoti sma tasmai
balaṃ ca vīryaṃ sthiratāṃ ca saṃyuge
śūdraḥ strī vā sa me loke
kṣetre 'sminnivasanti ye sukṛtino bhaktāḥ sadā māṃ narāḥ
